div.p: This will typically be the outcome of a clinical assessment based on the base measures, including the exercise vital sign if the determination is that the patient is not meeting national guidelines for their age. It can serve as the reason for subsequent Referrals and Exercise Prescriptions and may be necessary for payers to provide coverage for physical activity-related services. In this IG, creation or updating of a Condition is always done internally by a Care Manager. However, external systems (i.e. Service Providers and Patient Engagement systems) can search for and retrieve these records.
